website_summaries.verdict: Quest 4D is heavier than other boots, but that's because it's intended for longer backpacking trips. Shorter hikers will want to avoid these boots because the boots will hit too high on the leg for comfortable movement.
pros: Height makes these a good fit for taller hikers
Uses running shoe technology to increase stability and comfort and decrease weight
Protective rubber toe and heel caps
cons: Toe box is uncomfortable and hurts some toenails
Design is too tall for short hikers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, functional, cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was my big shoe purchase of the year. I desperately needed to replace my ancient REI brand boots, and chose Salomon because my parents both recently bought them and loved them. They're waterproof too, which my old pair sadly wasn't anymore after years of trekking and lack of care. I hope to keep these for another decade plus! I wear eight in pretty much all shoewear. This wasn't an exemption. My feet are a-typical though, running narrow except for my stupid genetic bunions (thanks mom, my grandmother, and great-grandmother). Feet don't slide around, but have space to spread in case of inevitable swelling.
customer_reviews.author: mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I hiked for 10 days in the Canadian Rockies and my feet were very uncomfortable. It wasn't my first hike. The shoe itself is very heavy, the ankle support is great but I've never had so many bad blisters, even one on the top of my toe... i lost my toenail actually! I wished I had a different pair when i was hiking. It doesn't always works for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift. She says they are extremely comfortable and fit very well. Her feet do not slide. The heal cup cradles her heal comfortably and the ankle support is great. She has flat feet and these are very comfortable. The arch support is perfect for her. She wears a size 11 in a woman's shoe, so we got her a size 11.5 in this boot. It leaves her room for a thick sock if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Boots
customer_reviews.text: Daughter typically wears a 6. Got these in a 5-1/2 after ordering a 6 and finding it too large. We backpack into some very extreme wildernesses and these boots are outstanding. Light and water-resistant and uber comfortable. No heel blisters and feet don't hurt after 10 or 11 hours on the trail. Will be taking them to Nepal for our hike to Everest Base camp next year.
customer_reviews.author: KAL In GilbertAZ

customer_reviews.title: These were good for the first 10 miles but hurt like hell ...
customer_reviews.text: These were good for the first 10 miles but hurt like hell for miles 11 to 14. The fault might have been mine (I purchased "right size" boots instead of boots a size larger) but by mile 14 I was hurting so badly I did the last mile barefoot because it hurt less.
customer_reviews.author: Meri A.

customer_reviews.title: Runs about 1/2 size large, roomy toe box
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, light and I love the support. Runs about a 1/2 size large in my opinion. the toe box is very roomy. I always wear a 9 in shoes, it would never occur to me to go down in size. I will keep them though and wear a fuller sock, I cant imagine ever having an 8.5 fit? Update- I now am on my 3rd pair ! Love these boots! Great support, I am on my feet a lot! I have gotten used to the “room” in the toe box and feel it actually adds to the comfort of the boots when wearing them all day. Changed my review from 4 to 5!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Not for low-volume feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solid boot, but sadly not for my foot. I have a "low volume" foot (very flat also) and this boot is HUGE in the inside. Felt like my foot was flopping around inside it, and there's only so much that socks can do. I hope it works for others!
customer_reviews.author: theredheadsaid

customer_reviews.title: Freakin' love this boot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these in my normal size and they fit good. My husband loved mine so much he got a pair too. We go snowshoeing in them & they stay dry & warm. I recommend taking good care of these boots (re-waterproofing every so often) & they should last a long time. They are light weight yet extremely sturdy boots that you stil feel connected to the ground in them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: size 9 They are comfortable but will be putting them to the test on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had on a trail yet. I am breaking them in by wearing to work. The boot is a little wide in the toebox for me but I do have narrow feet. size 9 They are comfortable but will be putting them to the test on the trail this weekend. I mainly bought for rappelling. I have torn up a lot of boots on rock faces and crawling in caves. I hope they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: KittyR1987

customer_reviews.title: Best investment these boots carried me up Mt Kilimanjaro
customer_reviews.text: Best investment these boots carried me up Mt Kilimanjaro. A bit on the heavier side but it is what you would expect from a multi-day, serious trekking boots. Seriously waterproof. The camel color looks great even after getting dusty, but looks as good as 90% new after a quick clean. I think these boots will be with me for many many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a snow boot!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nice, but if you are not used to wearing high tops, I would suggest buying the mids. These were like wearing snow boots when hiking and it wasn't very comfortable for me. I returned them for the mid height and am much happier and comfortable. Great support and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Wish they lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the boots, but for the price, I would hope they would last longer. I've had for about a year, hiked about 250 miles, and the sole is starting to separate on one boot. They aren't totally dead yet, but i don't have too much longer. I tried to take care of them as recommended. I liked them enough to buy another pair. Please make better quality....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable and best boots money can buy. Great quality and is amazing. Not a summer time hiking boot though so please keep that in mind. Has so much cushion you can use regular socks.
customer_reviews.author: BoonDockSaint1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box! I have a high arch and have a hard time finding comfortable footwear. My old Salomon hikers died, and I am glad I ordered the Womens' Quest 4d....Nice design, accurate sizing, and I need no added arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu in TX

customer_reviews.title: They are the best best best
customer_reviews.text: They are the best best best! Im in love with them! They are exactly what i was looking for. Even beter! If you are looking for a very confortable, strong, support, tof, waterproof and preatty bacpacking hicking boots. This is the one. The lacing system is very strong, which is perfect for me, because im tof with those. I have narrow feet but high and toes that takes room. Its the best fit ever for me! Thanks to Salomon, i cannot beleive their great price for it! How did i choose them? I did a research about ( the best women hicking boots) and thats what came up as num 1#🏅
customer_reviews.author: Jinny

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable boots I've worn in a very long time
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly (size 8, womens). There was practically no break-in period for these backpacking boots, even in the lower shin area. They are the most comfortable boots I've worn in a very long time. I've had numerous foot issues in the past few years (neuromas, tendonitis) so comfort and quality are very important to me. My custom orthotics fit into them also.
customer_reviews.author: NewDoctor

customer_reviews.title: They fit true to size and comfortable around the foot
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. They fit true to size and comfortable around the foot, but rubbed my ankle a lot. Not sure if it just takes time, but anyway, I think something more lightweight would be better for my needs which are day trips rather than multi-day trips with large packs.
customer_reviews.author: harley

customer_reviews.title: Get boots from in country!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure not to buy from an out of country seller of you don't want to pay HUGE shipping fees! Sports Unlimited is in the UK. The shoes I received were too big despite having tried them on in store in the US. The 6.5 US size was a good fit but I thought I didn't need them so I didn't buy. Then I decided that I needed a heavier boot. Boy what a surprise when a 6.5 didn't fit and a $50 shipping fee!
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty boot!
customer_reviews.text: these might be more boot than I need- I have the 3D version, and they are more comfortable. if I had a heavy pack or need for more ankle support, then these would be my first choice. but for light hiking and packs less than 20 pounds, I prefer the 3D.
customer_reviews.author: cutter23

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot! I'm usually a 7.5 in women's but it was way too big even with thick socks so I sent it back for a size 7 which is perfect! Definitely think about sizing down. The shoe itself is perfect and has great ankle support, which was the main reason I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: Run a little big, but still buy your exact size.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, quality boot, but runs large, which is ok if wearing thick socks. My feet have a tendency to swell when on very long hikes, so it is not an issue. They do make my feet look big, but they are comfortable. The nylon laces are a bit of a pain. They don’t stay tied without a double knot.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I haven't gone hiking with them yet but I wore them all day and they were very comfy. The toe box is roomy, which I love, and they felt great right out of the box! I have several pairs of Salomon boots and now have a new favorite brand!
customer_reviews.author: Murray's mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - cute
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only taken them hiking once but they had decent grip in the snow and on ice. The sole is a bit stiff, incoming from a pair of Merrill’s with Vibram sole so it’s a totally different animal. GREAT ankle protection, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie T.

customer_reviews.title: They look good and feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn them on a hike yet, but I've worn them around town and they are super comfy. The only downside might be the extra room in the toe box, but I won't know for sure until I get out there and do some actual hiking in them. But, it's safe to say, there's plenty of room for foot swell.
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: Got me through the Inca trail!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these when I hiked the Inca trail. I had no blisters and they were super comfortable. Additionally they had great cushion and ankle support. I highly recommend them. Note: I wore them around and to work for about 1-2 months before the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They are super comfortable with zero break-in time needed. I have already done over 50 walking/hiking miles in them between work and play! My job is outdoors and demanding so they take care of me with no complaints. They are waterproof, durable, rugged, and supportive! Thumbs up times 10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been hiking in these for three months now and I’m in love. Lightweight yet ultra supportive. I love the lace system because my laces seem to stay tied more than any other boot I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: DiscoYoga

customer_reviews.title: Especially love the extra space in the toes
customer_reviews.text: Have done some homework on hiking boots and these are the right ones! Especially love the extra space in the toes. I’ve taken them on some longer hikes, through streams and on steep grades. My feet remain dry, comfortable and I never slip on any slopes. My boyfriend also bought a pair of Solomon’s and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I got the off color because they were cheaper, fit just like the kind in REI. Color doesn't matter if your hiking, they all end up brown, right?! These are so comfortable and supportive, excellent ankle support and protection. I will be buying these again when these wear out after a few more hundred miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No blisters, excellent tread.
customer_reviews.text: Zero blisters on first trip. Two days 22 miles. My feet were very secure in this boot, with excellent tread. I did not slip even once with approximately 15 stream and river crossings. The boots are true to size with room to spare. I am a 10, I bought a 10. Same for my daughter...she bought a slightly different Salomon moddle, in her regular size. I'm hooked, sold, convinced, and a believer.
customer_reviews.author: taxacc

customer_reviews.title: Sadly have to move on...
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking boots, however I have bigger lower calves and I could tell right away that they would be uncomfortable for me as they come up quite high above the ankle (felt like constrictive ski boots). Skinny legged folks will likely love!
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: However they are quite heavy. I live in a very wet state and have two dogs so rain or shine we hike. I've walked thru shallow streams and feet stayed dry!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Carpe

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Size down a half size at least! That being said these are fabulous. Good support and cushioning. The lacing system really keeps my tiny heel in place - usually I'm slipping all over the place. Breaking them in, in advance of a multi day hike and no issues no far. I do add insoles to all my shoes, so can't speak to the original insole.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline St. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered because I have a wide foot, it fits really well. I would have preferred to get a brown color, but the black works. I have not used these in the field yet, so cannot speak to their durability, but for walking around the yard and house, they have been really comfortable. I would recommend this boot.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Worn twice and really like these hiking boots. The first time was a steep climb with 2 hours walking and not a blister. They are not too heavy either and the toe box fits my wide foot just fine. The tie system works easily too.
customer_reviews.author: ksa

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting, most comfortable hiking boots ever
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting, most comfortable hiking boots ever. Room in the toebox, doesn’t slide up and down my heel... plenty of coushion for long hikes. The only thing I can mildly complain about is the laces... they are slick and come untied. That’s no biggy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Vallier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these books because reviews said that they fit well and took little breaking in. The first time I wore them, they fit properly and I and I had no hot spots or blisters. They are comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sturdy hiking boots. If you are going long distance or on very uneven ground, this is the boot. It’s light for its use and has a great comfortable fit from the start.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Best boot I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: Best boot I've had yet. No water leakage, used to have a mid-height and went full ankle with this one. Best decision, don't roll my ankle going downhill in these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Vong

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box comfortable and fit was exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box comfortable and fit was exactly as expected. My girlfriend also informed me that the lift at the was not too large for her fairly flat arch. Excited to get them out on the trail in the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Only first impressions at this point, but these boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Only first impressions at this point, but these boots seem consistent with my other two pairs of Salomons. I have Plantar Fasciitis, so the support offered by these boots offers instant relief.
customer_reviews.author: RC Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort water proof very durable great traction
customer_reviews.text: These boots rock! Very comfortable even after 25 miles through goat trails. Highly recommended if your looking for comfortable waterproof and durable boots. My wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Rakers

customer_reviews.title: and the fit and performance was the same as my past 2 pair - perfect. The boots felt like they were made for ...
customer_reviews.text: Took my first hike in my new Salomons yesterday, and the fit and performance was the same as my past 2 pair - perfect. The boots felt like they were made for my feet. Thank you for making a comfortable hiking boot!
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and fitting hiking boots. The insole is very good. The strings are stiff but I'm sure they will get flexible as I wear them. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES. I did a lot of reviewing on ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SHOES. I did a lot of reviewing on hiking shoes and everyone was right these are amazing. Comfortable, great support and waterproof. I am looking forward to more hikes in these.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: but are so comfortable, I feel like ready to go on a ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m “breaking them in”, but are so comfortable, I feel like ready to go on a long hike today. They’re terrific.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, very grippy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Wore these boots around for a couple of days then did a huge hike to Half Dome from the village to peak and back. Super comfortable, very grippy and supportive! My ankles chafed a little, but that was more my fault than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sulgi

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of boots I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of boots I ever had , I read great things about these boots right out of the box . I got my boots on a Thursday , wore them that night , started a 52 mile hike got one hot spot & one little blister. I was a grunt in the United States Army , so I know about hiking , these boots get a 12 out of 10 .
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ginter

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort! These are the best hiking boots I have ever tied! No issues with my first hike in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette M.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I could never really break them in. Every time I wore them, I’d get a blister on my feet and they would rub around the backs of my ankles/legs.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Mansager

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. The fit perfectly and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Chu

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle stabilization
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ankle support, good fit while not being binding or too snug. Stuck with me through a glacier tour and waterfall tour.
customer_reviews.author: Invictrix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Lightweight but very sturdy and supportive. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use for winter hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my GF, she loves it. Nice to use for winter hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Vitalii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome; hiked Glacier National Park in these. Comfy, sturdy and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Carriecsjo

customer_reviews.title: Great boot I was glad to find size 11 in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot I was glad to find size 11 in women's. I own several pairs of Solomons my self.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for a camping trip we're planning. The boot looks awesome and looking forward to see how it stacks up on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Reliable comfort
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable with no break in time needed, a fantastic hard working quality boot. I wear them daily around the hills in Wellington New Zealand, where it's currently winter. These boots are put to the test daily in some very wet muddy and arduous conditions - my Salomon Quest boots continue to impress me 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Best hiking boots I've ever had. They're super comfortable to wear all day, and I never got water in them even when I walked through soggy fields, shallow rivers etc. Never had blisters or anything, which was quite common with my previous boots from Solomon and Lowa. They're good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great show. Better price here than at local outdoor stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she feels like a "mountain goat" in these
customer_reviews.text: Wife hasn't owned hiking boots before these, but has done one 14er in running shoes, and one in these boots. She says there's no comparison, she feels like a "mountain goat" in these. They are comfortable and grip great, giving her confidence on loose or slippery rocks. She says toes did get a little uncomfortable hiking down after several hours, but not unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Salomon product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hiking boot! Had to order a half size smaller and there is still plenty of room for thicker socks. My feet are never sore after 5 miles of hiking on rocky trails several times a week. Very comfortable and the deep treads keep my feet from slipping. Love Salomon shoes, they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Quality Salomon hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are as described. Good quality Salomon hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive for long treks
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable supportive bpots I’ve ever owned, I can walk all day without my feet hurting for the first time. So I bought this pair for my wife, First time she’s hiked without getting blisters.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Great straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for much-needed additional ankle support for an upcoming walking tour. They were comfortable right out of the box and so far so good as I break them in in various situations (walking, hiking, standing, outdoor work) and with different socks. I have high arches, wide feet, and problematic toes, so the more generous fit is wonderful. I would happily backpack in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Julia P. Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried it in a store first. It is a little bit wide but feel very confortable
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: My Brand New Salomon Women's Quest 4D 2 GTX Hiking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like the boots, I have custom made orthotics and they fit perfectly, I need hard core ankle support and these give me just what I need, the only complaint I have, was they didn't come with the quicklace attachment that I thought I was getting, the booklet attached to the boot even shows you how to use the quicklace feature but mine don't have it. I hope to be enjoying my boots for many great adventures. I would recommend these boots to anyone who needs something very sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer D&D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Excellent Boots a few hikes and just was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: JRBUSSER

customer_reviews.title: And feel fit perfect size, no tight
customer_reviews.text: I got the boots and want see how is fit it? And feel fit perfect size, no tight. It is not bad but when walk while few days little sore by side it is not big hurt no, maybe get new first will be use will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: structurally sound hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy and fits right. Is providing good structure for my left foot which has a pronation problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A. McDade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These feel fantastic, can't wait to take them on the trails!
customer_reviews.author: Suz G

customer_reviews.title: All the reviews mentioned how comfortable these boots were right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews mentioned how comfortable these boots were right out of the box. I totally agree. Put them on, and went for a 4 mile, somewhat moderate hike. Great pair of boots!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect, good forefoot volume when feet swell. Waterproof for sure, tested every day in snow slush and slop above 6500 feet. These boots kick ass!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P Goidich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The boot runs way big so I must send it back . Beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Dava Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot. I got it for a great price ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot. I got it for a great price and was everything I expected. Comfortable out of the box and provides great support. I usually just use trail running shoes while hiking but wanted a more sturdy, waterproof, comfortable option for backpacking. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G. Pio

customer_reviews.title: but it would be great for ankle
customer_reviews.text: a little taller then I thought...but it would be great for ankle support
customer_reviews.author: llmoyers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Worn on a 10 mile hike the first day, felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Amburgey

customer_reviews.title: you just found the best womens hiking boot avaible
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but I really want to share how awesome these boots are. I have bought and worn many different brands of hiking boots...as far as traction, support and durability go Solomon boots are the very best. I do hike, but have a pair of these for every day use in the winter months. If you are stuck wondering which brand to purchase,,,,in my opinion you have found your answer. Order a half size up and you should be pleased with fit and have room for extra thick socks or extra cushion under the existing insole. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: D Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable.. you can walk forever witho u r your feet getting sore. They are way more than I expected. They're warm in the winter and cool in the summer.. they're great...
customer_reviews.author: tiffanie miller

customer_reviews.title: Bought myself a pair first and then one for each ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself a pair first and then one for each of my 3 daughters. Gearing up to hike 220 miles from Yosemite to Mt. Whitney along the John Muir Trail this summer.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Salomon hiking boots they fit great and are very supportive without being to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: MEGraff

customer_reviews.title: these do not disappoint. From day one they were awesomely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Salomons just fit me well and are always my go to shoe/boot; these do not disappoint. From day one they were awesomely comfortable. Can't wait to snow shoe and hike in these.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: It's supportive as it states, especially around the ankles ...
customer_reviews.text: It's supportive as it states, especially around the ankles. The boots are a bit firmer and stiffer than I had wanted, but seems it will be ok once you break it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worn twice on the flat. Will know more after use hiking with elevation gain.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy from eastern Washington

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Comfortable, not too heavy. Have done 10 mile hikes in them with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome! I wore them hiking in winter and ended ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Awesome! I wore them hiking in winter and ended up in a few shallow streams and they kept my feet perfectly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely amazing except for the laces but it is just a minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs. One for me and one for sis. Worth every cents. Comfy as hell. Snug fit. Simply the best. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots and awesome delivery service
customer_reviews.text: it is well packaged and the delivery service is really quick considering from US to NZ in a week. It is somewhat a bit large about half size, but manageable and pretty comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for hiking in dry and wet conditions. No break-in needed. Very comfortable and reliable. Used for snow-shoeing and attaches well to snow shoes and crimpons.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Love this boots
customer_reviews.text: Love this boots! Probably will take some time to break them in. I am a size 39/40 european and US size 8 fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Luisina comes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After 10 hikes - seems like the best boot I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Still breaking them in but great support and cushioning. These should work well for some upcoming treks!
customer_reviews.author: peggy zafarana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots shortly before a weeklong back country canoe and hiking trip in Killarney Provincial Park, Ontario, after realizing that my old boots weren't up for the trip. I didn't have a lot of time to break them in, but as it happened, I really didn't need to. The boots fit great, were super comfortable, no hot spots. The longest day was an eight hour hike over a lot of rugged, wet and muddy mountain terrain. The boots felt great all day, kept my feet dry, and provided excellent traction. I see a lot of trips in my future wearing these. They're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots but they were definetly too large and I ordered them to my true size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I went through the easy return process
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8. I initially got a half size bigger (8.5) based on some other reviews. I tried them on with some hiking socks, but they were a little big. I didn't want my foot moving around too much and cause blisters, so I went through the easy return process. I got the second pair shipped immediately and had 30 days to return the first pair with no additional charge. They are a little clunky, but I think it is just because I am used to a hiking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybadger

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly and provide great ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery! They fit perfectly and provide great ankle support. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boot, but runs a size small.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for normal socks, but it's too small if you want to wear winter-weight socks. It's not as bad in length as it is in width, so if you have a wide foot, I'd suggest looking at a different boot. I ordered my size, but I replaced it with a size up after discovering they were too small while on the trail. Other than that, it performs well. Minimal breaking in necessary, and there weren't any hot spots out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: good ankle fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Kind wide toe box, good ankle fit. No break in needed.
customer_reviews.author: hsiaohung ku luo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and are exactly as described :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I luv how they hug my ankles & provides great support. I've twisted my ankle sevarl times in ...
customer_reviews.text: Luv luv luv these hiking shoes! I was a bit worried that the ankle support would feel bulky & heavy, but didn't feel that at all. In fact, I luv how they hug my ankles & provides great support. I've twisted my ankle sevarl times in my last pair of hiking boots so decided my next pair would def, have this. Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Salomon Women's Quest 4D 2 GTX Hiking Boot
product_meta.description:
The quest 4D 2 gtx for women makes backpacking just a little easier. This lightweight but supportive boot borrows from running shoe technology to provide stability and comfort, while keeping the weight down. AND a high-top cuff and full waterproof bootie ensure protection all year long.

Salomon was born in 1947 in the heart of the French Alps and the birthplace of modern alpinism. Driven by a passion for skiing and design innovation, Francois Salomon and his son George designed and perfected much of the first modern ski equipment. During the following 60 years, Salomon's commitment to innovative design and passion for mountain sports created a vast range of revolutionary new concepts in boots, skis and apparel and brought innovative solutions to footwear, apparel and equipment for hiking, adventure racing, mountaineering and trail running. Through performance-driven design, Salomon enhances mountain sports by converting new ideas into action and expanding the limits of possibility.
feature_bullets: Adjustable circumference; An abrasion resistant lining that allows for excellent breathability and quick drying
